subdisciplines.name: Molecular Genetics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the structure and function of genes at a molecular level.

subdisciplines.name: Proteomics
subdisciplines.description: The large-scale study of proteins, their structure, and their function.

subdisciplines.name: Structural Biology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the three-dimensional structure of biological macromolecules, such as proteins and nucleic acids.
